product_name: Hincapie Sportswear Edge HyperOptic Shoe Covers - Men's
long_description: Fully reflective, the men's Hincapie Edge HyperOptic Shoe Covers provide dry, thermal insulation as well as outstanding visibility as you ride in the cold and low light. Flexible, fleece-lined HyperOptic Roubaix(TM) material provides a comfortable, warm, conforming fit and resists moisture. Clean-finished cleat ports on the Hincapie Edge HyperOptic Shoe Covers accommodate most shoes and pedals. Openings with auto-locking zippers facilitate easy layering.
short_description: Fully reflective, the men's Hincapie Edge HyperOptic Shoe Covers provide dry, thermal insulation as well as outstanding visibility as you ride in the cold and low light.
